title: New And Tyler1 Fan
body:
Hi guys I would like to say hello and say I am new to the game I migrated from DOTA and other games. Friend said this was a easy to play game. So I decided to play it. Any tips would be fine. I do realise that this game has some SALT in it. No worries there. I would liek to play the game with someone than alone.  

Thanks

replies.body: Did your friend pick that name for you?

"some salt"

Yet you associate yourself with the Saltiest League player of all time, lmao
